item.description:
ORGANIZER: Mark
CONTACT: http://photo.meetup.c...
TARGET AUDIENCE: All Members

Dear Members,

As you may have heard the Kanegis Gallery is gearing up for a spring release of a whole new line of work. This Sunday at 1pm to 2pm the gallery will be open to our group to offer his current custom work at a substantial discount (portfolio http://kanegisgallery....

If there is interest we'll head out for a late lunch and a walking tour of Rockport (bring your camera's!).

www.kanegisgallery.com

Cheers, Eileen
item.name: Signs of spring ... meetup and group hike/walk Sunday.
